speaker.name: Roberto Polli
speaker.biography:
Roberto joined in the [Italian Digital Transformation Department](https://innovazione.gov.it/it/progetti/api/) - to create a national API Ecosystem based on internet standards.

He's a Red Hat Certified Engineer and MySQL/MongoDB certified DBA, but loves maintaining free software.

A life ago he took a Math degree, and he's really proud of it.
